titles.title: Love Divine, All Loves Excelling (Charles Wesley)

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come, Almighty to deliver, let us all Thy life receive; suddenly return and never, nevermore Thy temples leave. Thee we would be always blessing, serve Thee as Thy hosts above, pray and praise Thee without ceasing, glory in Thy perfect love.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
